reasoning: The Tasks UI is intentionally hidden in the codebase per ticket CONTENT-8436 with explicit code '$tasks.hide(); return;'. The test attempted to verify collapse functionality for a feature that has been deliberately disabled by design, not broken.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows the PersonaBar with Settings menu open but no Tasks UI present. The test observations confirm the Tasks panel is intentionally hidden via JavaScript code per a specific ticket (CONTENT-8436), with the backend API still functional but the UI deliberately suppressed.
